creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Acrylic painting on cotton of a woman and child on a wooden floor next to an open fire. The child touches a pot of boiling water hanging over the fire with a look of pain on their face. The woman is reaching for the child and screaming with a shocked and angry expression."]

title: Chapter 2, The Return of Dr. N
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Acrylic painting on cotton of two scenes side by side. The left scene shows schoolchildren standing behind their desks. The child in front has a bandaged hand. The scene on the right shows a person lying on a surgery table with a group of doctors standing around them."]

title: Chapter 3, The Return of Dr. N
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Acrylic painting on cotton of two scenes side by side. The left scene shows a person sitting behind a desk, handwriting a document by candlelight. The right scene shows performers dressed in traditional Japanese clothing on a stage in front of a table of people."]

title: Chapter 4, The Return of Dr. N
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Acrylic painting on cotton of two scenes side by side. The left scene shows two people, one wearing a lab coat, looking at a test tube filled with red liquid. The right scene shows a person with fishnet stockings, heels, and a top hat performing in front of a table of people eating and drinking."]

title: Chapter 5, The Return of Dr. N
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Acrylic painting on cotton of two scenes divided by a swath of Japanese calligraphy. The top left scene shows an old person writing by hand on a piece of paper. The bottom right scene shows a person with dark hair and a mustache in a lab coat reading the same paper."]

title: Chapter 6, The Return of Dr. N
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Acrylic painting on cotton of two scenes side by side. The left scene shows two doctors operating on a baby. The right scene shows a person with dark hair and a mustache with their eyes closed in a bed and a doctor standing next to them."]

title: Chapter 7, The Return of Dr. N
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Acrylic painting on cotton of two scenes side by side. The left scene shows a group of people walking off an airplane, led by a dark-skinned man with a mustache. Text at the bottom says \"Black Dr. N Arrived At Tokyo International Airport\". The right scene shows a ruined factory. Text at the bottom reads \"Nuclear Power Plant Was Exploded in Fukushima\"."]

title: Chapter 8, The Return of Dr. N
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Acrylic painting on cotton of two men with dark hair and mustaches. The left man is sitting up, while the right man is lying in a hospital bed. A paragraph of text dedicated to \"Our forefather, Dr. N\" is written in the top left corner. Small images sit along the top, the left of which shows a man with a mustache drinking with two women, while the right shows a doctor looking at several X-ray scans."]

title: Between Clouds And Water
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Ink and colour on a long vertical hanging scroll. The top and bottom mounts of the scroll are drawn upon with coloured ink patterns consisting of Chinese knots and flowers. Underneath the upper mount are vertically ordered Chinese characters made up of narrow strokes. The main part of the scroll is a portrait-oriented landscape painting of rivers and mountains. In the foreground, a man and a woman stand on a bridge, making eye contact with a fisherman under the pine tree at right. Outside a pavilion in the middle ground, a woman leans on the door with the palm of her hand on her face."]

title: Sea Flowing Unstopping…Forms Floating Sinking…
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Ink painting on a white silk screen depicting small black dots that come together to form irregular lines extending from the bottom of the silk upwards, before fading out near the top. The lines resemble waves and mountain ranges. At the bottom, a poem is inscribed in Chinese characters, in sparsely sprinkled dashes of strokes. Part of it reads, ‘Sea water waving and waving uninterrupted… only forming shapes and shapes floating and submerging… That ephemeral… that ephemeral… that ephemeral… that ephemeral…’."]

title: The End of the Road — In the "New Territory" of Hong Kong, miserable" squatters" house refugees from China. In the foreground a new apartment house is rising
titleTC: 路的盡頭──位於香港新界的寮屋破舊不堪，裏面住着許多來自中國的難民。照片前景為一棟興建中的公寓大廈。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — Hong Kong, 1952
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — The mirage, which is real. Houses going up in the overcrowded, unsanitary refuse area outside Hong Kong, but few refugees will be able to afford the rent-low as it is.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──真實幻景。房子建於香港以外的廢棄區域，該處人滿為患，衛生惡劣，儘管租金低廉，只有少數難民能負擔入住。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — In the rooms of the Chinese Nationalist refugees in Rennie's Mills, General Chiang Kai-shek's picture in splendid uniform and noble pose is always present. The man in the foreground was an officer in the Nationalist Underground movement. Now he can't go to Formosa because he needs someone to guarantee for him.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──這些擁護民族主義的中國難民房間裏，總是掛有蔣介石將軍的相片。相中蔣介石穿着亮麗的軍服，展現高雅的姿勢。此照片前景的男子為國民黨秘密行動的軍官，他現時回不了台灣，因需別人擔保。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — A "cafe" in Rennie's Mills. These men are convinced Chinese nationalists, and worship Chiang Kai-shek as a hero.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──調景嶺一「咖啡店」。相中男子均認為蔣介石是中國的民族主義者，視他為英雄般崇拜。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — Barracks shops, restaurants and the inevitable "squatters" in the background: The Chinese refugees' settlement in Rennie's Mills in the "New Territory" of Hong Kong.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──棚屋商店、餐廳和當地「寮民」：位於香港新界調景嶺的中國難民營
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — At Rennie's Mills, the social Welfare Organization distributes new ration cards. For most of the refugees, this is the most exciting event in a dreary, hopeless existence.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──社福機構在調景嶺分發新的配給證。對大部分難民而言，這是沮喪絕望的生活中最可喜之事。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — A woman fanning her child at Renne's Mills. Her house has been burnt down in a fire, she is without house or home and the future holds little promise of improvement.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──一名居住調景嶺的婦人為其孩子扇風。她的房子在火警中燒毀，由於失去家園，今後生活前景渺茫。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — The squatters. Settlement of poor Chinese refugees outside Hong Kong.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──寮屋居民。位於香港以外的貧困中國難民營。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — In this settlement a fire broke out recently and some of the refugees were robbed of their last possessions.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──難民營最近發生火警，有些難民連僅餘的財物也被掠走。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — Squatters' colony vista. Nearly a million refugees in Hong Kong have no prospect of returning to their native villages in China, and they have become Hong Kong's biggest problem. There is hope that in the near future these tattered dewellings may give way to new cheap lodgings to rent for 30 HK dollars per month. There are frequent fires because of the condition of the squatters' "homes". Social welfare provides free meals for five victims and they are decently housed until they find new lodgings - but for some 300,000 others, this is home.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──寮民遙望香港這片殖民地的景色。近百萬名滯留香港的難民無望返回中國故鄉村落，並成了香港最大的問題。居民不久後或有望搬離這些破爛的房子，以每月三十港幣租住新建廉價寄宿舍。鑑於寮民居住環境惡劣，火警頻生。社福機構事後為五名火災受害人提供免費膳食，並在他們覓到新的寄宿處前，提供舒適的地方居住。可是，對於難民營內另外三十多萬人來說，這裏便是他們的家。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: The End of the Road — Food is distributed twice a day at Rennie's Mills and two hours beforehand lines form in front of the cook house. Most of the refugees just leave out their bowl or pail to "keep their place" in the queue.
titleTC: 路的盡頭──調景嶺居民每天獲派糧食兩次，大批難民提早兩小時到廚房前排隊，部分人以碗盆或桶子「霸位」。
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港

title: Qi 311
creditLine: M+, Hong Kong
creditLineTC: M+，香港
images: ["Landscape-oriented beige paper with five wide lines in blue ink—drawn with an extra-large flathead paintbrush—moving in parallel from left to right, covering most of the paper with a wave-like texture. The upper left and bottom left corners are each imprinted with a red seal. The one on top reads, in Chinese, ‘Enlightenment in the absence of material comfort’, while the other reads, ‘Capturing the essence without capturing the form’. The latter text is a play on words: these characters also form an idiom meaning ‘to be carried away by excitement’."]

images: ["Black and white illustration of a person in a spacesuit standing on a planet. The spacesuit is unusual in many ways: the torso looks like a naked, hairy chest, one of the feet is shaped like a two-toed hoof and the other like a metal shoe, one of the person’s hands has three fingers and the other looks like a pair of scissors, and two smoking pillars stick out of the round helmet. A large variety of fantastic creatures float around in the space around the person, including a octopus-like creature with three eyes and a three-legged robot with human eyes peering out of a narrow box and a long neck."]
